textAfterTable: 5 Songs Customer Reviews Great New Stuff ( Halleluyall)           by Wyreba96 Love the new songs and changes in the old songs. Can't wait to hear what the new album will have on it. I do have my fav already but I'm up to hear more new stuff. :) Biography Formed: Nashville, TN Genre: Country Years Active: '00s, '10s Bomshel began as an ambitious Tuesday night ritual, where vocalist Buffy Lawson and fiddler Kristy O. would use Nashville's slowest bar night as their stepping stone into one of the most intimidating music scenes around. Soon, Tootsie's Orchid Lounge was filled with people, including some who would routinely make a lengthy drive to see Bomshel perform. Soon the women attracted major attention and were signed to Curb Records, where they were given their own label, Bombstop! Records. In 2009 the group... Full Bio Top Albums and Songs by Bomshel
